infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app does not use your camera but contains libraries that require camera permissions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app does not use your photo library but contains libraries that require photo permissions.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app does not use your location but contains libraries that require location permissions.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app does not track you but contains libraries that require tracking permissions.
